7.14.23  5:05 am   is mayonnaise an instrument?

      no, but it can be used to enhance other instruments

7.14.23  2:54 am   Barbie or Oppenheimer

      for me it will be barbie

7.14.23  12:58 am   can you tell me when 'at the corner store' was written?

      the first 4 bars of melody/chord (with a TEMP dummy lyric 'at corner store' blah blah 'brand new world') are from oct 18, 2021. everything else was written april 3-4, 2022

7.14.23  12:56 am   What topping have you not yet had on pizza?

      asbestos

      yes

7.14.23  12:32 am   What inspired your music style and your overall aesthetics? 

      just me being normal

7.13.23  11:57 pm   is there anything that isn't any good whatsoever?

      it seems that any good answer to this would therefore be good for answering this. so it seems impossible to find something

7.13.23  11:47 pm   what is your opinion on the range of sounds that an electric guitar can make?

     a fantastic, fascinating range

     from what I can tell your songs use the keyboard more frequently, but I assume you are not opposed to guitar (?)

     i love the world of guitar. i would pursue it in an alternate life, where i could dedicate myself fully to all ways and realms of the guitar. instead, i've found myself more involved in the worlds of keyboard, drumming, and language

7.13.23  9:44 pm   what is your ideal set of 3 colors?

      FF0000,00FF00,0000FF

7.13.23  9:04 pm   What was your favorite song to make and why

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.13.23  8:38 pm   how do you spell "spell"?

      i have no idea

7.13.23  7:13 pm   can you describe the sound of a metal pipe falling at a 45° angle to the ground

      kalang, kalangala grrrrrssshhh

7.13.23  6:53 pm   there is something like a paradox called the ship of theseus. basically there's this ship and a guy called theseus used it to go some places. eventually the ship started breaking so they had to replace some parts and eventually they replaced every part. now the question is: is the ship still the same?

     yes and no

     if not, then when did it stop being the same as the old one?

     gradually throughout the entire process

     if it's the first piece switch that makes it no longer the same, then anytime you fix physical, it's not the "same" anymore. this keeps me up sometimes. please help

     it's like a gradient. you can speak about it on any level of detail. maximum level of detail would specify exactly how much, and which parts, have changed. minimum level of detail would either call it a new ship or the same ship, depending on whether the conceptual identity or physical condition is the subject of the conversation

7.13.23  6:24 pm   Do you have any good tips on managing time?

     all the good tips probably cancel each other out

     Because that's something I struggle with and I was wondering if you had any thoughts

     just try one strategy, then see if it works, then try another one, etc........ i don't particularly think there's gonna be any absolute solutions. i've sort of accepted that it's meant to be an ongoing game

7.13.23  5:08 pm   hello bill, do you think making a website to post your stuff is better than to just have them posted on yt/spotify/social media, etc? why's that? love the website, btw :)

      what drove me to make my own website is the level of control, authenticity, and simplicity i can have, that simply isn't available any other way

7.13.23  4:02 pm   What is a good way to pass time in Idaho?

      see if you can figure out a way to get into one of the neighboring states

7.13.23  3:32 pm   is yellow green cause cacti is brown

      no

7.13.23  3:23 pm   Are you gonna make a song about water?

      all options are on the table

      i have no earthly idea

7.13.23  12:33 pm   michael jackson?

      no i think he is on another website

7.13.23  10:37 am   what are your strengths and weaknesses

      my strong point is being too weak and my weak point is being too strong

7.13.23  10:28 am   why didnt you talk about canada

      i talk about canada quite a lot. "in canada, there is no speed limit. only maximum speed"

7.13.23  10:20 am   Why do you make the content that you do?

      to see what it's like

7.13.23  9:08 am   what do you use to make your cool music

      'common sense'

7.13.23  8:18 am   If Steve's name is my name, wouldn't it be Drew?

      for you, yes, if that is your name

7.13.23  3:28 am   if you could change the color of the sky what would you do?

      make it more colorful

7.13.23  1:31 am   can you tell me what my name is

      no

7.13.23  12:21 am   do you think

      yes i do

7.12.23  11:38 pm   opinion on chocolate?

      too good

7.12.23  11:34 pm   7.9.23  9:54 pm my current solution to questionable vocal quality is just to record a whole bunch of takes and splice them together, but is this smart? i worry that because i'm not forced to get one entire super high quality take i won't improve. i'm curious to hear your thoughts on this, and if/when you've used this tactic. thanks

      your concerns are valid. the more we have editing technology available, inevitably the more we use it. i always fantasize about somehow forcing myself to pretend i'm living in a universe with no edits allowed. but i've never found a way to make this work. i suppose, in a way, there is a magic blessing in the age of editing which is this: if you do too many takes, your voice gets tired out. so in a way, you're still under pressure to get it right sooner rather than later

7.12.23  10:09 pm   How many chords you used in total from jingles in "history of the entire world, i guess" 

      i remember from the production process that there are approximately 66 jingles, and i suppose i could estimate that there are an average of 4 chords per jingle. so my loose estimate is 264

7.12.23  10:04 pm   do you enjoy giving facts when the format of the question seems to be asking for an opinion

      i do enjoy that. i enjoy the undertone of highlighting the peculiar relationship between fact and opinion

7.12.23  7:39 pm   do you have any preference between for example "Dm7" and "D-7" for D minor 7 notation-wise?

      for myself, i always write D-7. but when i'm writing publicly i usually say Dmin7, just in case someone might not know the "-" symbol for minor and i don't want them to think i said "D7" or something

7.12.23  7:07 pm   What is your mbti results? Ok it might sound cringe but I'm just asking.

     different every time, because i answer the questions differently each time

7.12.23  7:02 pm   How on earth did I become so different from all the other words for I in other germanic languages?

      the only other ones i know are "ik" (nederlands) and "ich" (deutsch) ...... which actually don't seem all that different to me

      it's on my to do list

      let me perform some calculations

      sometimes i answer other people's questions instead

      absolutely not

      yes

      the only baby i had in "outside" is the song itself, which i named "outside"

7.12.23  12:17 pm   what is steve's real name if it isn't steve

      it's the same as yours

7.12.23  11:07 am   Hey bill, I just graduated from college and am a lifelong musician. Do you think it's wise to just work odd jobs and music gigs and build up my music career, or should I get a masters degree in something more traditional and get a regular job and get regular friends that way? 

      i have no idea what a masters degree is so i cannot advise

      pretty good

      not that i know of

      a cucumber is considered a NOUN
